Patient: Manoj
Medical Condition: hypertension

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with fruits
Lunch: Steamed vegetables with brown rice
Snack: Carrot sticks, nuts
Dinner: Grilled fish with vegetables

Day 2:
Breakfast: Smoothie with oats and almond milk
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Fruit salad
Dinner: Vegetable soup with whole grain bread


--------------------------------------------------

Dinner: Grilled fish with vegetables

Day 2:
Breakfast: Smoothie with oats and almond milk
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Fruit salad
Dinner: Vegetable soup with whole grain bread

Lunch: Steamed vegetables with brown rice
Snack: Carrot sticks, nuts
Dinner: Grilled fish with vegetables

Day 2:
Breakfast: Smoothie with oats and almond milk
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Fruit salad
Dinner: Vegetable soup with whole grain bread

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:

Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:

Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 2:

Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:

Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:

Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 2:

Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:

Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:

Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Medical Condition: diabetes

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with skim milk
Lunch: Quinoa salad with legumes
Snack: Apple slices, almonds
Dinner: Grilled tofu with spinach

Day 2:
Breakfast: Vegetable smoothie, whole grain toast
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
Snack: Low-fat yogurt, berries
Dinner: Steamed fish, steamed vegetables
